dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
Global companies especially those in the USA are legally empowered to accept a fully compliant signed sworn PDF attachment copyright notice. (Which is merely a copy of the original) as exactly is also a fax. Attached

Notice of Copyright reference http://darksideofpencil.blogspot.com/
Mr C R Slater
49A City Road 
Newcastle upon Tyne
NE12AQ England
07871430052
crs@spamcop.net

Sir, Madam,

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

The material is currently illegally clearly displayed on your servers without any given author/owner consent. It must be removed today as dated. 

If signed copy of this notice is required by your company I will email one today via PDF attachment (identical as fax) for you to view/print.

/Christopher R Slater/
Christopher R Slater

Material displayed as below on your servers and clearly marked at my own web site at location(s).

Christopher R Slater 2005
